name: Submerged (itch) (vallerieknight)
description:
A child (Max) lost in their imagination in a bath comes up with a world of a submarine, with little bath toys they're rescuing. Controlled by arms swimming in the ocean with each analogue stick, you have to collect as many of the bath toys as you can in the time provided.

---

This game was made for GGJOnline! The theme was "Lost & Found", so we went with the whole idea of a kid being lost in their own imagination and finding fun from really mundane things, like a bath.

Credits, with social links!
Art: Leanne Koala - https://www.instagram.com/leannekoalaillustration
Programming: Val Knight - https://twitter.com/VallerieKnight / https://www.valknight.xyz/

Music by EmpoweringArts
